```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}

library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

#get data
the_df <- read_csv("../data/events-calendar.csv")
colnames(the_df) <- c("url","pretty_date","title","description","location","data_date","time","date")
the_df$description <- str_trim(the_df$description)

#generate output

the_df[1,]$date -> first_date
cat(paste("# ", the_df[1,]$date, sep=""))

for(i in c(1:nrow(the_df))) {
  cat("\n\n")
  if(the_df[i,]$date != first_date) {
    cat(paste("# ", the_df[i,]$date, sep=""))
    first_date <- the_df[i,]$date
  }
  cat(paste("\n### ", the_df[i,]$title, " (", the_df[i,]$time, " @ ", the_df[i,]$location, ")", "\n\n ",the_df[i,]$description, sep=""))
}
```
